name: HTMLLabelElement
description: The HTMLLabelElement interface gives access to properties specific to <label> elements. It inherits methods and properties from the base HTMLElement interface.

members.name: HTMLLabelElement.control
members.description: Is a HTMLElement representingÂ the control with which the label is associated.

members.name: HTMLLabelElement.form
members.description: Is a HTMLFormElement object representing the form with which the labeled control is associated, or null if there is no associated control, or if that control isn't associated with a form. In other words, this is just a shortcut for HTMLLabelElement.control.form.

members.name: HTMLLabelElement.htmlFor
members.description: Is a string containing the ID of the labeled control. This reflects the for attribute.
